text:
Hello letelete, 

Amazing work!

The python script that you wrote is really impressive \(^_^)/. Also, we are really impressed by the way you chose to do this task. Great job! 

I found few minor issues that were present in your sheet, can you please fix them? Some issues (e.g issue mentioned in cell 94A) have a pull requests that were sent to them but the pull requests were later closed because they couldn't resolve the issue. In such a case, the issue would have to be classified as "open". 

I apologize for not mentioning this in the task. Can you please fix these minor errors and then get back to us? 

Other than that, everything else is perfect. Amazing work! \(^_^)/
task_definition_name: Mifos Android Client app - Organize GitHub Issues

text: Oh and just wanted to add that everything is done by myself. I wasn't re-using someone's work, only made use of google spreadsheets and python api.
task_definition_name: Mifos Android Client app - Organize GitHub Issues
Mifos Android Client app - Organize GitHub Issues

text:
Hey, I wrote a python script to automatize, this, documentation process. 

It's available on my GitHub account under MIT license (https://github.com/letelete/Easy-Issues-Documentation). I've made some entry testing and everything looks fine for now. I'm not the Python guy, so the code quality might not be amazing, but It gets its job done.

Furthermore, I've run that on my google spreadsheet for the android-client repo, to get this task done and give you some preview. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1sysJ09YMN4m8Ex1ZufGfm3iMadkIIX8SKPXPHIlJaAY/edit?usp=sharing

As you might notice, there is some extra-status-value: 'multiple_prs'. It's because script found multiple, but unique prs reference to currently checked issue. For example: when pr#999, pr#988 and pr#996 reference issue #800 - the status will be 'multiple_prs'. It's sometimes hard to tell if some issue got resolved by any of these references, so I decided to do that in this way.

Would love to get your feedback :)
task_definition_name: Mifos Android Client app - Organize GitHub Issues
